CustomField.description: This text will appear if registration is unavailable due to the instance reaching capacity and/or the registration date passing. It will also appear if/when the related instances is not in an Active status.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This text will appear if registration is unavailable due to the instance reaching capacity and/or the registration date passing. It will also appear if/when the related instances is not in an Active status.
CustomField.label: Event Closed Display Text
